alert.note: Alert for Benton; Henry (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 3:13PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Benton, northeastern Carroll and south central Henry Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 312 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bruceton, or 8 miles east of Huntingdon, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Camden, Bruceton, Vale, Hollow Rock, Mansfield, Mixie, Spring Creek, Crews Store, Garretsburg, Ephesus and Buena Vista. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
